title: Portfolio Creative
shortDescription: Showcase your personal brand or creative portfolio beautifully.
longDescription:
This template emphasizes modern layouts, bold visuals, and clean typography, making it perfect for artists, designers, and professionals who want to stand out online.

It comes with customizable gallery sections, project highlights, and testimonial blocks to help you attract new clients.

The responsive design ensures that your work shines across desktop, tablet, and mobile devices.

title: E-commerce Store
shortDescription: Modern e-commerce landing page optimized for conversions.
longDescription:
Built with product highlights, testimonial sections, and call-to-action banners.

This template is designed to keep users engaged and increase sales, while providing a seamless browsing experience across desktop and mobile.

Itâ€™s ideal for online stores looking to create a strong first impression.

title: Startup SaaS
shortDescription: Perfect for tech startups and SaaS product launches.
longDescription:
Highlight your app or software features with clean sections for benefits, screenshots, and customer testimonials.

The design is optimized for high conversions and product sign-ups, giving your SaaS a professional and modern look.

This layout helps you communicate your value proposition clearly.

title: Corporate Business
shortDescription: A sleek design tailored for corporate and enterprise needs.
longDescription:
This template includes sections for services, team introductions, and business highlights.

It is structured to instill trust and showcase professionalism, making it ideal for companies targeting B2B or B2C clients.

Strong typography and clean layouts ensure clear communication.

title: Creative Portfolio
shortDescription: Display your creative portfolio with style and impact.
longDescription:
Designed for freelancers, designers, and agencies, this template focuses on large visuals and minimal text to let your work speak for itself.

The flexible gallery and case-study layout provide storytelling opportunities for each project.

Featuring product highlights, app screenshots, and integration sections.

This template provides credibility for startups looking to launch new apps or digital services with style and professionalism.

title: Consulting Business
shortDescription: Tailored for consultants, agencies, and corporate services.
longDescription:
This template provides structured layouts for services, case studies, and testimonials.

It positions your brand as trustworthy and reliable, helping to attract corporate clients and long-term partnerships.

title: Minimal Portfolio
shortDescription: A minimal and elegant template for professionals.
longDescription:
Focused on simplicity, this template is perfect for showcasing photography, writing, or design projects.

The minimal design keeps attention on the portfolio content itself without distractions.

title: Modern E-commerce
shortDescription: Designed for online stores to boost engagement and sales.
longDescription:
Includes customizable sections for products, categories, and offers.

The user-friendly layout and mobile optimization ensure customers enjoy a seamless shopping experience.

title: Product SaaS Launch

longDescription:
Packed with feature highlights, sign-up CTAs, and pricing tables.
